metadata.name: The Shipment #1
metadata.description:
This short movie tells the story of Pepe's mafia character, which deals with the Popaine.

Popaine is an inspiration toward making billions and billions of ETH.
Cocaine is like a seed; Pepaine is a forest.

It took a month to make this video, including screenwriting, studio design, costume design, mask making, filming, sound, and post-production.

To be continued...
